Common.name: Common Salmon
Common.description: It's just a basic fish... don't get too excited.

Common.name: Brown Trout
Common.description: Not the prettiest catch, but it counts.

Common.name: Rusty Boot
Common.description: Why is there always a boot in the water?

Common.name: Pond Carp
Common.description: Fat and lazy. A bottom-feeder, just like your ex.

Common.name: Tiny Perch
Common.description: Small enough to fit in your pocket. But why would you?

Common.name: Mudcat
Common.description: Grimy and greasy, straight from the mud.

Common.name: Pebble Crab
Common.description: Technically not a fish. Barely a snack.

Common.name: Slippery Smelt
Common.description: Slips out of your hand more than it should.

Uncommon.name: Silver Pike
Uncommon.description: Fast and aggressive. Keep your fingers safe.

Uncommon.name: Jade Snapper
Uncommon.description: Its green scales shimmer in the sunlight.

Uncommon.name: Ghost Carp
Uncommon.description: Pale and silent, like a fishy phantom.

Uncommon.name: Crimson Koi
Uncommon.description: A beautiful catch, often kept in private ponds.

Uncommon.name: Silt Dweller
Uncommon.description: Burrows under the muck. Tough to find.

Uncommon.name: Albino Catfish
Uncommon.description: Rare coloring gives it away easily.

Rare.name: Thunderfin
Rare.description: They say it only appears during storms.

Rare.name: Lava Eel
Rare.description: Hot to the touch. Found in volcanic waters.

Rare.name: Moonfish
Rare.description: It glows faintly under moonlight. A sign of good luck.

Rare.name: Glass Perch
Rare.description: Completely transparent. Hard to see, harder to catch.

Rare.name: Deepsea Angler
Rare.description: Terrifying teeth. Lives where light dies.

Rare.name: Whisperfin
Rare.description: It hums softly when removed from the water.

Rare.name: Spectral Ray
Rare.description: Ghostly and rare. Glides like a spirit.

Rare.name: Golden Sturgeon
Rare.description: Large, majestic, and covered in golden scales.

Rare.name: Echo Pike
Rare.description: You always hear it before you see it.

Rare.name: Shadow Haddock
Rare.description: Dark as night, vanishes when not watched.

Legendary.name: Pirate's Sword
Legendary.description: Rusty but sharp. Was it lost in a duel at sea?

Legendary.name: Cursed Compass
Legendary.description: Always points to something you'd rather avoid.

Legendary.name: Kraken Tentacle
Legendary.description: Still twitching. Do NOT eat this raw.

Legendary.name: Poseidon's Tear
Legendary.description: A shimmering fish believed to be blessed by the sea god.

Legendary.name: Sirenfish
Legendary.description: Sings a song that tempts sailors to dive in.

Legendary.name: Sunken Crown
Legendary.description: Encrusted with coral, belonged to a drowned king.

Legendary.name: Storm Eel
Legendary.description: Crackling with electricity, formed in hurricanes.

Legendary.name: The Leviathan
Legendary.description: More legend than fish. If you caught this, you're a god.

Legendary.name: Mermaid's Scale
Legendary.description: Shimmering and warm. Proof of legends.
